FirmwareInfoDef.description: This indicates the properties which apply to all firmwares

VendorIANA.description: The IANA Enterprise Id of the hardware vendor

CompatibleHardware.description: The compatible hardware with name format com.<vendor>.Hardware.<XXX> specified by vendor in phosphor-dbus-interfaces

DevicePropertiesDef.description: This indicates the properties for devices representing chip models attached to an I2C bus

Bus.description: The I2C bus index to which the device is connected

Address.description: The I2C address of the device on the bus

ChipModel.description: The chip model of the device

EEPROMDeviceFirmware.description: The configuration parameters for flashing the EEPROM device

Name.description: The unique identifier or label for the EEPROM device

MuxGPIOs.description: The GPIO line toggles the mux to switch the EEPROM connection to the BMC

MuxGPIOPolarities.description: The polarity for the mux gpios which toggle the EEPROM to BMC
